definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: These reference books are necessary to us.
sentences.chinese: 这些参考书是我们所必需的。

sentences.english: It provided a reference for the quality control of the drug.
sentences.chinese: 为该成药质量控制研究提供了参考依据。

sentences.english: This paper presents suggestions establishing a stable geological team.
sentences.chinese: 提出建立一支稳定的地质找矿队伍等参考性建议。

sentences.english: This paper can serve as the reference for the mills to select the board machine.
sentences.chinese: 本文试述纸板成形器的选用与发展趋势，供同行参考。

sentences.english: Psychopathological classifications, which emphasize the mother-child relationships, are essential reference marks.
sentences.chinese: 心理病理学分类，着重于母子关系是必要的参考标准。

sentences.english: A good reference is number of rotations from the point of release to the arrows.
sentences.chinese: 从离手后到目标箭头的长度是段不错的参考距离。

sentences.english: The conclusions can provide references for the field performance of hydrau- perforating and fracturing.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果可为水力射孔及压裂的现场施工提供参考。

sentences.english: We enclose a catalogue for your reference.
sentences.chinese: 随函附上一份目录供你方参考。

sentences.english: Is to study the Qing important reference book of poetry.
sentences.chinese: 是研究清诗的重要参考书。

sentences.english: And these can offer a reference to the designer.
sentences.chinese: 可供煤巷掘进机的设计和研究人员参考。

sentences.english: Similarly, avoid values that could result in errors due to the reference-input current.
sentences.chinese: 同样，由于输入参考电流避免导致误差的值。

sentences.english: The securities identified above represent a selection of securities identified by GMO and are for informational purposes only.
sentences.chinese: 以上所述的证券为GMO选定的一批证券，仅供参考。

sentences.english: You may also forward us a list of qualified drivers from your respective countries for our reference.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以自贵国传一份合格选手的名单给我们参考。

sentences.english: Cardholders will be given a reference number upon successful registration of the Coupon Promotion.
sentences.chinese: 成功登记之客户于完成登记时将获发一个参考编号。

sentences.english: This research provides guidelines for financial institutions to choose future mergers and acquisitions targets.
sentences.chinese: 本研究亦可作为未来金融机构选择购并对象时之参考。

sentences.english: This article provides a quick-reference guide for the new functionality offered in the technical preview.
sentences.chinese: 本文提供了技术预览版新功能的快速参考指南。

definition: to consult a reference/to refer to (another document)
see also/please refer to/compare (cf.)/to consult for reference
to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
according to this/on the ground of the above/(formally introduces reported speech in writing)
